sources.name: InsertLog
sources.description: exec_log に エラーログを insert します。

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	exec_na as string,
	log_text as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'insert into exec_log\n(exec_na, log_type, log_text)\nvalues\n(\'hoge\', \'1\', \'foo\');\n',
	format: 'query') ~> InsertLog
